name: Musiic Party: Rock the House
overview: Musiic Party: Rock the House turns any gathering into a party! Desigaed exclusively for Wii, making the most of the Wii Remote and the Nunchuk. The controls are easy to learn for all of your band mates no matter what their age. Choose the story mode to create your own rock legend, go head to head in a music battle to see who's boss, or rock the night away as a band with your friends or family. - No peripherals required - 3 instruments: bass guitar, lead guiat & drums - 30 legendary rock tracks - Just pick up & play!
